trans-unit.source: Uses a mask to distinguish between proper and improper user input.
trans-unit.target: 使用遮罩區別適當及不適當的使用者輸入。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> class is an enhanced <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control that supports a declarative syntax for accepting or rejecting user input.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>類別是增強<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>支援宣告式語法，接受或拒絕使用者的輸入控制項。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A> property, you can specify the following input without writing any custom validation logic in your application:
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A>屬性，您可以指定下列項目而不需要撰寫任何自訂驗證邏輯應用程式中輸入：

trans-unit.source: Required input characters.
trans-unit.target: 必要的輸入的字元。

trans-unit.source: Optional input characters.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的輸入的字元。

trans-unit.source: The type of input expected at a given position in the mask; for example, a digit, or an alphabetic or alphanumeric character.
trans-unit.target: 輸入遮罩; 中的指定位置中預期的類型例如，數字或字母或英數字元。

trans-unit.source: Mask literals, or characters that should appear directly in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>; for example, the hyphens (-) in a phone number, or the currency symbol in a price.
trans-unit.target: 遮罩常值，顯示或字元應直接在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>; 例如，在電話號碼或在價格的貨幣符號的連字號 （-）。

trans-unit.source: Special processing for input characters; for example, to convert alphabetic characters to uppercase.
trans-unit.target: 特殊處理，例如輸入字元。例如，若要轉換成大寫的字母字元。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> control is displayed at run time, it represents the mask as a series of prompt characters and optional literal characters.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>控制項隨即顯示在執行階段，它代表的遮罩為一系列的提示字元和選擇性的常值字元。

trans-unit.source: Each editable mask position, representing a required or optional input, is shown with a single prompt character.
trans-unit.target: 代表必要或選擇性的輸入，每個可編輯的遮罩位置會以單一的提示字元中顯示。

trans-unit.source: For example, the number sign (#) is often used as a placeholder for a numeric character input.
trans-unit.target: 例如，數字符號 （#） 通常用於做為預留位置的數字字元的輸入。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar%2A> property to specify a custom prompt character.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar%2A>屬性來指定自訂的提示字元。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.HidePromptOnLeave%2A> property determines if the user sees the prompt characters when the control loses input focus.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.HidePromptOnLeave%2A>屬性會決定是否使用者會看到提示字元，則當控制項失去輸入焦點。

trans-unit.source: As the user types input into the masked text box, valid input characters replace their respective prompt characters in a sequential fashion.
trans-unit.target: 在遮罩的文字方塊中，輸入使用者類型，有效的輸入的字元會取代其各自的提示字元，以循序方式。

trans-unit.source: If the user types an invalid input character, no replacement occurs, but instead a beep is issued if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.BeepOnError%2A> property is set to `true`, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 使用者輸入無效的輸入的字元，如果沒有替代項目，就會發生，但如果要改為發出嗶聲<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.BeepOnError%2A>屬性設定為`true`，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected>就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: You can provide your own custom error logic by handing this event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由處理這個事件來提供您自己的自訂錯誤邏輯。

trans-unit.source: When the current insertion point is at a literal character, the user has a number of options:
trans-unit.target: 當目前的插入點位於常值字元時，使用者會有許多選項：

trans-unit.source: If a character other than the prompt character is typed, the literal will automatically be skipped and the input character will be applied to the next editable position, represented by the next prompt character.
trans-unit.target: 如果輸入提示字元以外的字元，常值將會自動略過輸入的字元將會套用至下一個可編輯的位置，由下一步 提示字元。

trans-unit.source: If the prompt character is typed and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AllowPromptAsInput%2A> property is true, the input will overtype the prompt character and insertion point will be moved to the next position in the mask.
trans-unit.target: 如果輸入提示字元而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>屬性為 true，輸入將會取代提示字元並插入點將會移至下一個位置遮罩中。

trans-unit.source: As is always the case, the arrow keys can be used to navigate to a previous or subsequent position.
trans-unit.target: 因為一律是這樣，方向鍵可用來瀏覽至之前或之後的位置。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskFull%2A> property to verify whether or not the user has entered all of the required input.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskFull%2A>屬性，確認是否在使用者已輸入所有必要的輸入。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A> property will always retrieve the user's input formatted according to the mask and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TextMaskFormat%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A>屬性一律會擷取使用者輸入的格式是根據遮罩和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TextMaskFormat%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> control actually defers all mask processing to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider?displayProperty=nameWithType> class specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>控制項實際上會延後所有遮罩處理<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider?displayProperty=nameWithType>所指定類別<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This standard provider supports all Unicode characters except for surrogates and vertically combined characters; however, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AsciiOnly%2A> property can be used to restrict input to the characters sets a-z, A-Z, and 0-9.
trans-unit.target: 此標準提供者支援 surrogate 除外的所有 Unicode 字元，並以垂直方式合併字元;不過，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AsciiOnly%2A>屬性可以用來限制字元組 a-z，A-Z、 0-9 的輸入。

trans-unit.source: Masks do not necessarily guarantee that a user's input will represent a valid value for a given type; for example, -9 could be entered for an age in years.
trans-unit.target: 遮罩並不一定保證使用者的輸入，將代表給定的類型; 有效的值例如，無法輸入歲數-9。

trans-unit.source: You can verify that a user's input represents a valid value by assigning an instance of that value's type to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.ValidatingType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以驗證使用者的輸入代表有效的值，藉由指定該實值型別執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.ValidatingType%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can detect whether the user removes focus from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> when it contains an invalid value by monitoring for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 您可以偵測使用者是否移除焦點從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>藉由監視包含無效的值時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted>事件。

trans-unit.source: If type validation succeeds, the object representing the value will be available through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TypeValidationEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TypeValidationEventArgs> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果型別驗證成功，表示值的物件可透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TypeValidationEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TypeValidationEventArgs>參數。

trans-unit.source: As with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control, several common keyboard shortcuts do not work with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 如同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項，數個通用的鍵盤快速鍵不使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: In particular, CTRL-R (right justify text), CTRL-L (left justify text), and CTRL-L (center text) have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 特別是，CTRL-R （靠右對齊文字），CTRL-L （靠左對齊文字），CTRL-L （center 文字） 會有任何影響。

trans-unit.source: Compatibility with Visual Basic 6.0
trans-unit.target: 使用 Visual Basic 6.0 的相容性

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> was designed to retain most of the functionality of the Masked Edit control in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] 6.0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> 設計用來保留大部分的遮罩編輯控制項的功能[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]6.0。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists common properties on the Masked Edit control and gives their equivalents on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出遮罩編輯控制項上的通用屬性，並提供其對等用法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: Masked Edit control ([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] 6.0) property
trans-unit.target: 遮罩編輯控制項 ([!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] 6.0) 屬性

trans-unit.source: Equivalent MaskedTextBox ([!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]) property
trans-unit.target: 對等 MaskedTextBox ([!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]) 屬性

trans-unit.source: `AllowPrompt` property
trans-unit.target: `AllowPrompt` 屬性

trans-unit.source: `AutoTab` property
trans-unit.target: `AutoTab` 屬性

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: `ClipMode` property
trans-unit.target: `ClipMode` 屬性

trans-unit.source: `ClipText` property
trans-unit.target: `ClipText` 屬性

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A> (when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TextMaskFormat%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskFormat.ExcludePromptAndLiterals>)
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A> (當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TextMaskFormat%2A>設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskFormat.ExcludePromptAndLiterals>)

trans-unit.source: `Format` property
trans-unit.target: `Format` 屬性

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: `FormattedText` property
trans-unit.target: `FormattedText` 屬性

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A> (when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TextMaskFormat%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskFormat.IncludePromptAndLiterals>)
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A> (當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TextMaskFormat%2A>設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskFormat.IncludePromptAndLiterals>)

trans-unit.source: `Mask` property
trans-unit.target: `Mask` 屬性

trans-unit.source: `PromptChar` property
trans-unit.target: `PromptChar` 屬性

trans-unit.source: `PromptInclude` property
trans-unit.target: `PromptInclude` 屬性

trans-unit.source: `ValidationError` event
trans-unit.target: `ValidationError` 事件

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> control does not support multiline configuration or undo functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>控制項不支援多行組態或復原功能。

trans-unit.source: However, while the members associated with these features have been retained for compatibility with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> base class, their implementations perform no actions.
trans-unit.target: 不過，這些功能與相關聯的成員時保留相容性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>基底類別，它們的實作未執行任何動作。

trans-unit.source: The following code example initializes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> to accept a date, and uses both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted> events to alert the user to invalid input.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>接受日期，並使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted>事件，以提醒使用者輸入無效。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> class using defaults.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設值初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.%23ctor> constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider%2A> property to a null mask, represented by the string "<>".
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.%23ctor>建構函式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider%2A>屬性為 null 的遮罩，由 「 <>"的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A null mask will accept any combination of characters as input.
trans-unit.target: Null 遮罩將會接受做為輸入字元的任意組合。

trans-unit.source: A custom mask language provider, derived from the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider" /> 類別的自訂遮罩語言提供者。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> class using the specified custom mask language provider.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的自訂遮罩語言提供者，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The `maskedTextProvider` parameter defines the masking language used by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: `maskedTextProvider`參數會定義所使用的遮罩語言<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: It is responsible for parsing the mask and determining whether user input conforms to the current mask position.
trans-unit.target: 它負責剖析此遮罩，以及決定使用者輸入是否符合目前的遮罩位置。

trans-unit.source: You can derive a new class from <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider?displayProperty=nameWithType> to define your own custom masking language, and use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.%23ctor%28System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider%29> constructor to replace the standard <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以衍生新類別從<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider?displayProperty=nameWithType>定義您自己自訂的遮罩語言，並使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.%23ctor%28System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider%29>建構函式來取代標準<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: If you want to use the default masking language and supply your own input mask, you do not need to use this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要使用預設的遮罩語言，並提供您自己的輸入的遮罩，您不需要使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you can either use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.%23ctor%28System.String%29> constructor, or use the default constructor then set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.%23ctor%28System.String%29>建構函式或使用預設建構函式將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="maskedTextProvider" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="maskedTextProvider" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the input mask.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，表示輸入遮罩。

trans-unit.source: The initial value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask" /> 屬性的初始值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> class using the specified input mask.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的輸入遮罩，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.%23ctor%28System.String%29> constructor uses the standard <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider?displayProperty=nameWithType> with the input `mask` to parse user input into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.%23ctor%28System.String%29>建構函式會使用標準<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider?displayProperty=nameWithType>與輸入`mask`剖析使用者輸入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: If you assign a new mask to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A> property, it will override the value set by this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指派新的遮罩，以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A>屬性，則會覆寫這個建構函式所設定的值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="mask" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="mask" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value determining how TAB keys are handled for multiline configurations.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，判斷要如何針對多行組態處理 Tab 鍵。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported by <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> 不支援這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AcceptsTab%2A> property is inherited from the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AcceptsTab%2A>屬性繼承自基底<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>類別。

trans-unit.source: However, because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> control does not support multiline configuration, this property is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不過，因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>控制項不支援多行組態，不支援這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AcceptsTab" /> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AcceptsTab" /> 屬性的值已變更時。

trans-unit.source: This event is not raised by <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> 不會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AcceptsTabChanged> event is inherited from the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AcceptsTabChanged>事件都繼承自基底<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>類別。

trans-unit.source: However, because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> control does not support multiline configuration, this event is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不過，因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>控制項不支援多行組態，不支援這個事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar" /> can be entered as valid data by the user.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出使用者是否可以輸入 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar" /> 做為有效資料。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user can enter the prompt character into the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者可以將提示字元輸入到控制項中，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Even when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AllowPromptAsInput%2A> is `true`, the prompt character must be valid for the current location in the mask in order to be accepted.
trans-unit.target: 即使<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>是`true`，才能被接受，提示字元必須是有效的遮罩中的目前位置。

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar%2A> is "*", and the current location in the mask demands the user enter a digit, entering an asterisk (\*) will fail and cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected> event to occur.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar%2A>是"*"，和遮罩中的目前位置會要求使用者輸入數字輸入星號 (\*) 將會失敗並造成<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected>發生的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.ResetOnPrompt%2A> property takes precedence over <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.ResetOnPrompt%2A>屬性會優先於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> control accepts characters outside of the ASCII character set.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> 控制項是否接受 ASCII 字元集之外的字元。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if only ASCII is accepted; <see langword="false" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> control can accept any arbitrary Unicode character.
trans-unit.target: 如果僅接受 ASCII，則為 <see langword="true" />；如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> 控制項可接受任意的 Unicode 字元，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AsciiOnly%2A> restricts user input to the characters a-z and A-Z.
trans-unit.target: 如果`true`，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AsciiOnly%2A>會限制使用者的輸入字元 a 到 z 以及 A 到 Z。

trans-unit.source: ASCII control characters are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 不允許 ASCII 控制字元。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the masked text box control raises the system beep for each user key stroke that it rejects.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出遮罩文字方塊控制項是否會針對其所拒絕的每一個使用者按鍵輸入發出系統嗶聲。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> control should beep on invalid input; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> 控制項應該對無效的輸入發出嗶聲，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected> event will still occur if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.BeepOnError%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected>事件仍會發生如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.BeepOnError%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the user can undo the previous operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出使用者是否能復原先前的作業。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported by <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> 不支援這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.CanUndo%2A> property is inherited from the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.CanUndo%2A>屬性繼承自基底<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>類別。

trans-unit.source: However, because <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> does not support undo functionality, this property always has a value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: 不過，因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>不支援復原功能，這個屬性一律是否具有值為`false`。

trans-unit.source: Clears information about the most recent operation from the undo buffer of the text box.
trans-unit.target: 將與最近執行的作業有關的資訊從文字方塊的復原緩衝區清除。

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported by <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> 不支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.ClearUndo%2A> method is inherited from the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.ClearUndo%2A>方法繼承自基底<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>類別。

trans-unit.source: However, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> does not support undo functionality.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>不支援復原功能。

trans-unit.source: Creates a handle for the control.
trans-unit.target: 建立控制項的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: 建立控制代碼時，取得必要的建立參數。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" /> representing the information needed when creating a control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" />，表示建立控制項時所需的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the culture information associated with the masked text box.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與遮罩文字方塊有關的文化特性資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> representing the culture supported by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> 所支援的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Culture" /> was set to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Culture" /> 已設定為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether literals and prompt characters are copied to the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值可判斷是否會將常值和提示字元複製到剪貼簿中。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskFormat" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskFormat" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.MaskFormat.IncludeLiterals" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.MaskFormat.IncludeLiterals" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.CutCopyMaskFormat%2A> property determines how text, selected within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> control, is interpreted when it is copied to the clipboard or retrieved through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.SelectedText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.CutCopyMaskFormat%2A>屬性會決定如何將文字選取內<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>控制項，複製到剪貼簿或透過擷取時，會解譯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.SelectedText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it determines whether literal characters, prompt characters, or both are included when selected text is accessed.
trans-unit.target: 具體來說，它會判斷是否常值字元、 提示字元，或兩者都包含存取選取的文字時。

trans-unit.source: When prompt characters are excluded, they are transformed into spaces in the copied string.
trans-unit.target: 當提示字元會被排除時，它們會轉換成所複製字串中的空格。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TextMaskFormat%2A> property serves a similar purpose with respect to how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A> property is interpreted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TextMaskFormat%2A>屬性有類似的用途，相對於如何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A>屬性會被解譯。

trans-unit.source: Property set with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskFormat" /> value that is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 以無效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskFormat" /> 值所設定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider" /> to use when performing type validation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定當執行型別驗證時所用的 <see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the <see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider" /> 介面的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.FormatProvider%2A> determines which symbols are used for the currency, date, and other culture-specific mask placeholders when type validation occurs and the control has a non-null <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.ValidatingType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.FormatProvider%2A> 決定哪些符號用於貨幣、 日期和其他特定文化特性的遮罩預留位置類型驗證，就會發生，且控制項具有非 null 時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.ValidatingType%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The location from which to seek the nearest character.
trans-unit.target: 要從其中尋找最接近字元的位置。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the character that is closest to the specified location within the control.
trans-unit.target: 擷取最接近控制項內指定位置的字元。

trans-unit.source: The character at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 在指定位置的字元。

trans-unit.source: The location to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的位置。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the index of the character nearest to the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 擷取最接近指定位置之字元的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based character index at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 指定位置處的以零為起始的字元索引。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: 不使用這個參數。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the index of the first character of a given line.
trans-unit.target: 擷取指定行第一個字元的索引。

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported by <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> 不支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This method will always return 0.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法一定會傳回 0。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.GetFirstCharIndexFromLine%2A> method is inherited from the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.GetFirstCharIndexFromLine%2A>方法繼承自基底<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>類別。

trans-unit.source: However, because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> control does not support multiline configuration, this method is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不過，因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>控制項不支援多行組態，不支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the index of the first character of the current line.
trans-unit.target: 擷取目前這行第一個字元的索引。

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported by <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> 不支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This method will always return 0.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法一定會傳回 0。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.GetFirstCharIndexOfCurrentLine%2A> method is inherited from the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.GetFirstCharIndexOfCurrentLine%2A>方法繼承自基底<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>類別。

trans-unit.source: However, because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> control does not support multiline configuration, this method is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不過，因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>控制項不支援多行組態，不支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: 不使用這個參數。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the line number from the specified character position within the text of the control.
trans-unit.target: 擷取控制項文字內指定字元位置的行號。

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported by <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> 不支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: This method will always return 0.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法一定會傳回 0。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.GetLineFromCharIndex%2A> method is inherited from the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.GetLineFromCharIndex%2A>方法繼承自基底<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>類別。

trans-unit.source: However, because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> control does not support multiline configuration, this method is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不過，因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>控制項不支援多行組態，不支援這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The index of the character for which to retrieve the location.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取位置的字元索引。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the location within the control at the specified character index.
trans-unit.target: 擷取控制項內指定之字元索引的位置。

trans-unit.source: The location of the specified character within the client rectangle of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項之用戶端矩形內指定字元的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the prompt characters in the input mask are hidden when the masked text box loses focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出當遮罩文字方塊失去焦點時，是否會隱藏輸入遮罩中的提示字元。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar" /> is hidden when <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> does not have focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果當 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar" /> 沒有焦點時會隱藏 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text insertion mode of the masked text box control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定遮罩文字方塊控制項的文字插入模式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode" /> value that indicates the current insertion mode.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode" /> 值，表示目前的插入模式。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode.Default" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode.Default" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.InsertKeyMode%2A> property controls the character insertion behavior of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.InsertKeyMode%2A>屬性控制字元插入行為的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The state of this property is defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode> enumeration, which can be always on, always off or set to respect the setting of the user's keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性的狀態由定義<xref:System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode>列舉型別，可以永遠是 on，一律會關閉，或設尊重使用者的鍵盤設定。

trans-unit.source: This property supersedes the insertion mode of the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會取代鍵盤的插入模式。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the keyboard is set to overwrite, but <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.InsertKeyMode%2A> is set to `Insert`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> will operate in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果鍵盤設定為覆寫，但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.InsertKeyMode%2A>設為`Insert`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>會在插入模式下運作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteMode%2A> property will access the true insertion mode of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteMode%2A>屬性存取的則為 true 的插入模式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: If changing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.InsertKeyMode%2A> changes the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> will raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.InsertKeyMode%2A>的值變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteMode%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>將會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteModeChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This property has no effect if no mask has been set.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有遮罩已設定，此屬性任何作用。

trans-unit.source: An invalid <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode" /> value was supplied when setting this property.
trans-unit.target: 當設定這個屬性時，提供了無效的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is an input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的按鍵是輸入按鍵還是需要前置處理的特殊按鍵。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether new user input overwrites existing input.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出新的使用者輸入是否會覆寫現有的輸入。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> will overwrite existing characters as the user enters new ones; <see langword="false" /> if <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> will shift existing characters forward.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> 會在使用者輸入新的字元時覆寫現有的字元，則為 <see langword="true" />；如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> 會將目前的字元往前移，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteMode%2A> takes into account both the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.InsertKeyMode%2A> property and the state of the user's keyboard.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteMode%2A> 值會考量<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.InsertKeyMode%2A>屬性和使用者的鍵盤的狀態。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.InsertKeyMode%2A> is set to either <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode.Insert> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode.Overwrite>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteMode%2A> will return `false` or `true`, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.InsertKeyMode%2A>會設為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode.Insert>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode.Overwrite>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteMode%2A>會傳回`false`或`true`分別。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.InsertKeyMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode.Default>, it will return the state of the INSERT key.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.InsertKeyMode%2A>設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.InsertKeyMode.Default>，它會傳回插入的索引鍵的狀態。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteMode%2A> is `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> will reject as invalid any character entry that would result in a violation anywhere in the mask.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteMode%2A>是`false`，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>將會拒絕當做無效遮罩中的任何位置發生違規將會產生任何字元項目。

trans-unit.source: In explanation, if inserting a character would cause a character to be shifted over into a mask position where it would not be valid, the character insertion will be rejected.
trans-unit.target: 說明，在插入字元，就會發生要移位到位置不是有效的遮罩位置的字元插入字元將會遭到拒絕。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the insert mode has changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生在插入模式已變更之後。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteModeChanged> event is raised after value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteMode%2A> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteModeChanged>值之後，就會引發事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteMode%2A>屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: This event is required to properly bind data to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 此事件，才可正確繫結資料<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteModeChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> named `MaskedTextBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>名為`MaskedTextBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteModeChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the lines of text in multiline configurations.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定多行組態中的文字行。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported by <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> 不支援這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains a single line.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" /> 型別的陣列，包含單一字行。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Lines%2A> property is inherited from the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Lines%2A>屬性繼承自基底<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>類別。

trans-unit.source: However, because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> control does not support multiline configuration, this property is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不過，因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>控制項不支援多行組態，不支援這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the input mask to use at run time.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定執行階段所要使用的輸入遮罩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the current mask.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，表示目前的遮罩。

trans-unit.source: The default value is the empty string which allows any input.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為允許任何輸入的空字串。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A> is the default property for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A> 是預設屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A> must be a string composed of one or more of the masking elements, as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A> 必須是字串組成一或多個遮罩的項目下, 表所示。

trans-unit.source: The masking language used by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> is defined by its associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的遮罩語言<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>定義及其相關聯的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The standard provider specifies a masking language based upon the one used by the Masked Edit control in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] 6.0, and should be very familiar to users migrating from that platform.
trans-unit.target: 標準提供者指定根據遮罩編輯控制項中所使用的遮罩語言[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]6.0 中，而且應該是從該平台移轉的使用者非常熟悉。

trans-unit.source: Masking element
trans-unit.target: 遮罩項目

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Digit, required.
trans-unit.target: 數字、 所需。

trans-unit.source: This element will accept any single digit between 0 and 9.
trans-unit.target: 這個項目將會接受介於 0 到 9 之間任何單一位數。

trans-unit.source: Digit or space, optional.
trans-unit.target: 數字或空格，選擇性。

trans-unit.source: Digit or space, optional.
trans-unit.target: 數字或空格，選擇性。

trans-unit.source: If this position is blank in the mask, it will be rendered as a space in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個位置就是遮罩中的空白，它將會轉譯為空格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Plus (+) and minus (-) signs are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 加號 （+） 和減號 （-） 符號。

trans-unit.source: L
trans-unit.target: L

trans-unit.source: Letter, required.
trans-unit.target: 字母、 所需。

trans-unit.source: Restricts input to the ASCII letters a-z and A-Z.
trans-unit.target: 會限制為 ASCII 字母 a 到 z 以及 A 到 Z 的輸入。

trans-unit.source: This mask element is equivalent to [a-zA-Z] in regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 這個遮罩的項目就相當於 [的 A-ZA-Z] 規則運算式中。

trans-unit.source: Letter, optional.
trans-unit.target: 字母、 選擇性。

trans-unit.source: Restricts input to the ASCII letters a-z and A-Z.
trans-unit.target: 會限制為 ASCII 字母 a 到 z 以及 A 到 Z 的輸入。

trans-unit.source: This mask element is equivalent to [a-zA-Z]?
trans-unit.target: 這個遮罩的項目就相當於 [的 A-ZA-Z]？

trans-unit.source: in regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: 在規則運算式。

trans-unit.source: Character, required.
trans-unit.target: 字元，則需要。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AsciiOnly%2A> property is set to true, this element behaves like the "L" element.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AsciiOnly%2A>屬性設為 true，這個項目行為類似"L"項目。

trans-unit.source: C
trans-unit.target: C

trans-unit.source: Character, optional.
trans-unit.target: 字元，選擇性。

trans-unit.source: Any non-control character.
trans-unit.target: 任何非控制字元。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AsciiOnly%2A> property is set to `true`, this element behaves like the "?" element.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AsciiOnly%2A>屬性設定為`true`，這個項目行為類似 「？ 」 項目。

trans-unit.source: A
trans-unit.target: A

trans-unit.source: Alphanumeric, required.
trans-unit.target: 英數字元、 必要。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AsciiOnly%2A> property is set to `true`, the only characters it will accept are the ASCII letters a-z and A-Z.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AsciiOnly%2A>屬性設定為`true`，只有它會接受的字元是 ASCII 字母 a 到 z 以及 A 到 Z。

trans-unit.source: This mask element behaves like the "a" element.
trans-unit.target: 這個遮罩的項目行為類似"a"的項目。

trans-unit.source: a
trans-unit.target: 一個

trans-unit.source: Alphanumeric, optional.
trans-unit.target: 英數字元、 選擇性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AsciiOnly%2A> property is set to `true`, the only characters it will accept are the ASCII letters a-z and A-Z.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AsciiOnly%2A>屬性設定為`true`，只有它會接受的字元是 ASCII 字母 a 到 z 以及 A 到 Z。

trans-unit.source: This mask element behaves like the "A" element.
trans-unit.target: 這個遮罩的項目行為類似"A"的項目。

trans-unit.source: Decimal placeholder.
trans-unit.target: 小數預留位置。

trans-unit.source: The actual display character used will be the decimal symbol appropriate to the format provider, as determined by the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.FormatProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用實際顯示字元將會適當格式提供者，小數點符號，由控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.FormatProvider%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Thousands placeholder.
trans-unit.target: 千分位預留位置。

trans-unit.source: The actual display character used will be the thousands placeholder appropriate to the format provider, as determined by the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.FormatProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用實際顯示字元的千分位會適當格式提供者，由控制項的預留位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.FormatProvider%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Time separator.
trans-unit.target: 時間分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: The actual display character used will be the time symbol appropriate to the format provider, as determined by the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.FormatProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用實際顯示字元將 time 符號適當格式提供者，取決於控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.FormatProvider%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Date separator.
trans-unit.target: 日期分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: The actual display character used will be the date symbol appropriate to the format provider, as determined by the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.FormatProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用實際顯示字元將是適當的格式提供者中，日期符號，由控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.FormatProvider%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Currency symbol.
trans-unit.target: 貨幣符號。

trans-unit.source: The actual character displayed will be the currency symbol appropriate to the format provider, as determined by the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.FormatProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 所顯示的實際字元將適合的格式提供者的貨幣符號，由控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.FormatProvider%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Shift down.
trans-unit.target: 向下移動。

trans-unit.source: Converts all characters that follow to lowercase.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換成小寫之後的所有字元。

trans-unit.source: Shift up.
trans-unit.target: 上移。

trans-unit.source: Converts all characters that follow to uppercase.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換成大寫之後的所有字元。

trans-unit.source: Disable a previous shift up or shift down.
trans-unit.target: 停用先前 shift，向上或向下移動。

trans-unit.source: \|Escape.
trans-unit.target: \|逸出。

trans-unit.source: Escapes a mask character, turning it into a literal.
trans-unit.target: 逸出的遮罩字元，將它轉換成常值。

trans-unit.source: "\\\\" is the escape sequence for a backslash.
trans-unit.target: 「\\\\」 是反斜線逸出序列。

trans-unit.source: All other characters
trans-unit.target: 所有其他字元

trans-unit.source: Literals.
trans-unit.target: 常值。

trans-unit.source: All non-mask elements will appear as themselves within <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 所有非遮罩項目會顯示為本身內<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: Literals always occupy a static position in the mask at run time, and cannot be moved or deleted by the user.
trans-unit.target: 常值一律佔用遮罩中的靜態位置，在執行階段，並無法移動或刪除使用者。

trans-unit.source: If you change a mask when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> already contains user input filtered by a previous mask, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> will attempt to migrate that input into the new mask definition.
trans-unit.target: 如果您變更遮罩時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>已經包含使用者輸入之前的遮罩，由篩選<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>會嘗試移轉到新的遮罩定義該輸入。

trans-unit.source: If it fails, it will clear the existing input.
trans-unit.target: 如果失敗，它將會清除現有的輸入。

trans-unit.source: Assigning a zero-length string as the mask will preserve any existing data in the control.
trans-unit.target: 指派為遮罩的零長度字串將會保留任何現有的資料控制項中。

trans-unit.source: When used with a zero-length mask, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> behaves like a single-line <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 零長度的遮罩，搭配使用時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>行為類似單行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The decimal (.), thousandths (,), time (:), date (/), and currency ($) symbols default to displaying those symbols as defined by the application's culture.
trans-unit.target: 小數點 （.）、 千分之一 （，）、 （:） 的時間、 日期 （/） 和貨幣 （$） 符號預設顯示的符號，應用程式的文化特性所定義。

trans-unit.source: You can force them to display symbols for another culture by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.FormatProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以強制使用顯示另一個文化特性的符號<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.FormatProvider%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Character insertion into the mask at run time is controlled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.InsertKeyMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 將插入到遮罩字元在執行階段由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.InsertKeyMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Users can navigate through the mask by using the left and right arrow keys or the mouse cursor, and can skip optional positions in the mask by entering a space.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以使用左邊和右邊的方向鍵或滑鼠游標 來瀏覽遮罩，可以略過選擇性遮罩中的位置，輸入一個空格。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> supports all Unicode characters except for surrogates and vertically combined characters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> 支援 surrogate 除外的所有 Unicode 字元和以垂直方式合併的字元。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows example masks.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示範例遮罩。

trans-unit.source: Mask
trans-unit.target: 遮罩

trans-unit.source: Behavior
trans-unit.target: 行為

trans-unit.source: A date (day, numeric month, year) in international date format.
trans-unit.target: 國際日期格式日期天、 數字月份 （年）。

trans-unit.source: The "/" character is a logical date separator, and will appear to the user as the date separator appropriate to the application's current culture.
trans-unit.target: "/"字元是邏輯日期分隔符號，，並且會對使用者顯示適用於應用程式的目前文化特性的日期分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: A date (day, month abbreviation, and year) in United States format in which the three-letter month abbreviation is displayed with an initial uppercase letter followed by two lowercase letters.
trans-unit.target: 中的三個字母月份縮寫顯示第一個字母大寫後面兩個小寫字母與美國格式日期 （日、 月份縮寫和年）。

trans-unit.source: United States phone number, area code optional.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的區碼美國電話號碼。

trans-unit.source: If users do not want to enter the optional characters, they can either enter spaces or place the mouse pointer directly at the position in the mask represented by the first 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者不要輸入選擇性的字元，它們可以輸入空格，或直接將滑鼠指標置於遮罩中的第一個 0 表示的位置。

trans-unit.source: A currency value in the range of 0 to 999999.
trans-unit.target: 貨幣值範圍內的 0 到 999999。

trans-unit.source: The currency, thousandth, and decimal characters will be replaced at run time with their culture-specific equivalents.
trans-unit.target: 貨幣、 922337203685 及十進位字元將會在執行階段以取代其特定文化特性的對等用法。

trans-unit.source: The string supplied to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask" /> property is not a valid mask.
trans-unit.target: 提供給 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask" /> 屬性的字串不是有效的遮罩。

trans-unit.source: Invalid masks include masks containing non-printable characters.
trans-unit.target: 無效的遮罩包括含有不可列印字元的遮罩。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the input mask is changed.
trans-unit.target: 發生於輸入遮罩已變更後。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskChanged> event is raised after the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A> property is changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskChanged>之後的值就會引發事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A>屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: This event is also raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider%2A> is indirectly altered by a member such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AsciiOnly%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Culture%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果也會引發這個事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider%2A>間接成員例如更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AsciiOnly%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Culture%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> named `MaskedTextBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>名為`MaskedTextBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether all required inputs have been entered into the input mask.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出所有必要的輸入是否已經輸入到輸入遮罩中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if all required input has been entered into the mask; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有必要輸入項目已輸入遮罩中，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskCompleted%2A> checks only required input elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskCompleted%2A> 檢查必要的輸入的元素。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether all required and optional input elements have been filled in, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskFull%2A> property instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否所有必要和選擇性的輸入項目已填入，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskFull%2A>屬性改為。

trans-unit.source: Gets a clone of the mask provider associated with this instance of the masked text box control.
trans-unit.target: 取得與遮罩文字方塊控制項的這個執行個體有關的遮罩提供者的複製品。

trans-unit.source: A masking language provider of type <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: 型別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider" /> 的遮罩語言提供者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider%2A> property defines the mask-parsing engine and the masking language used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider%2A>屬性會定義遮罩剖析引擎所使用的遮罩語言<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default provider is the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider?displayProperty=nameWithType> class; however, a custom provider can be specified using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.%23ctor%28System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 預設提供者是<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider?displayProperty=nameWithType>類別; 不過，自訂提供者也可以指定使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.%23ctor%28System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider%29>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider%2A> cannot be set directly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider%2A> 不能直接設定。

trans-unit.source: However, setting some of the properties of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>—such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AsciiOnly%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Culture%2A>—may internally cause the creation of a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 不過，有些屬性的設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>— 例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AsciiOnly%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Culture%2A>— 在內部可能會導致建立新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether all required and optional inputs have been entered into the input mask.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出所有必要和選擇性的輸入是否已經輸入到輸入遮罩中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if all required and optional inputs have been entered; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已經輸入所有必要和選擇性的輸入，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskFull%2A> property within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected> event handler to determine if the user's input was rejected because there are no remaining inputs in the mask.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskFull%2A>內屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected>事件處理常式，以判斷使用者的輸入是否遭到拒絕，因為有沒有剩餘的輸入遮罩中。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether only required input elements have been entered, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskCompleted%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否已經輸入必要的輸入的元素，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskCompleted%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected> event, and uses a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> to alert the user if an attempt is made to enter data after all positions in the mask have been used.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected>事件，並使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>來提醒使用者如果嘗試在所有輸入資料都已使用遮罩中的位置。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user's input or assigned character does not match the corresponding format element of the input mask.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者的輸入或指派的字元不符合輸入遮罩的對應格式項目時。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected> is the default event for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected> 是預設事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected> event occurs when a character is rejected by the input mask.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected>輸入遮罩所拒絕的字元時，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: The input mask, represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A> property, is interpreted by the masked text provider associated with the control through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 輸入的遮罩，由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A>屬性，來與控制項關聯的遮罩的文字方塊提供者解譯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected> is raised in the following situations:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected> 在下列情況下產生：

trans-unit.source: An input character does not match the corresponding format element.
trans-unit.target: 輸入的字元不符合對應的格式項目。

trans-unit.source: For example, the user enters an alphabetic character when a digit is required.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用者可以輸入字母的字元數字時所需。

trans-unit.source: This is probably the most common reason why this event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 這可能是最常見的原因為何會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: The user is trying to input extraneous characters beyond the end of the mask either because the mask has already been filled or the current caret position has been moved to the very end of the displayed input mask string.
trans-unit.target: 使用者嘗試輸入遮罩的結尾有多餘的字元可能是因為遮罩已滿，或目前的插入號位置已經移至顯示的輸入的遮罩字串的結尾。

trans-unit.source: A paste operation either inserts a character that does not match its associated format element, or if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteMode%2A> property is `false`, it shifts existing characters into new positions where they do not match their format elements.
trans-unit.target: 貼上作業是插入的字元不符合其相關聯的格式項目，或如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteMode%2A>屬性是`false`，它會轉換為新的位置，它們不符合其格式項目位置的現有的字元。

trans-unit.source: A cut operation shifts existing characters to the left, and one or more characters do not match their newly associated format elements.
trans-unit.target: 剪下的作業會將現有的字元向左，及一或多個字元不符合其相關新的格式項目。

trans-unit.source: An assignment was made to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A> property and the assigned string caused one or more mask violations.
trans-unit.target: 指派已對<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Text%2A>屬性和指定的字串造成一或多個遮罩違規。

trans-unit.source: If a string was assigned to the control that causes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected> to occur, no part of the string will appear in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 字串，如果已指派給控制項之<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected>發生，字串的任何部分會出現在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: The default handling for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected> will play a beep sound if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.BeepOnError%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected>播放嗶聲的聲音如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.BeepOnError%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: This event is often handled to implement custom error handling, for example, to move to the next user input control if the mask is full, or to display a custom error dialog box or ToolTip if the input character is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常用於實作自訂錯誤處理，例如、 移至下一步的使用者輸入的控制項，如果遮罩已滿，或顯示自訂錯誤 對話方塊或工具提示，如果輸入的字元無效。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> named `MaskedTextBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>名為`MaskedTextBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskInputRejected>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters the user can type or paste into the text box control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定使用者能夠輸入或貼入文字方塊控制項中的最大字元數。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported by <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> 不支援這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性永遠傳回 0。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs.Position%2A> property in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs> class for information about how to determine the maximum length of a string in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs.Position%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskInputRejectedEventArgs>類別，如需有關如何判斷字串中的最大的長度資訊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is a multiline text box control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出這是否為多行文字方塊控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property is not fully supported by <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> 不完全支援這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性永遠會傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AcceptsTab%2A> property is inherited from the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.AcceptsTab%2A>屬性繼承自基底<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>類別。

trans-unit.source: However, because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> control does not support multiline configuration, this property is not fully supported; it cannot be set and it always resolves to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 不過，因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>控制項不支援多行組態、 不完全支援這個屬性，則無法設定，並永遠會解析為`false`。

trans-unit.source: Typically occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Multiline" /> property has changed; however, this event is not raised by <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件通常發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Multiline" /> 屬性已變更時，但它不是由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> 引發的。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MultilineChanged> event is inherited from the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MultilineChanged>事件都繼承自基底<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>類別。

trans-unit.source: However, because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> control does not support multiline configuration, this event is not implemented in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 不過，因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>控制項不支援多行組態，此事件未實作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.HandleCreated" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteModeChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.IsOverwriteModeChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.OnIsOverwriteModeChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.OnIsOverwriteModeChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.OnIsOverwriteModeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.OnIsOverwriteModeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.OnIsOverwriteModeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.OnIsOverwriteModeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
